info.name: Shift Backend API - Oman Job Marketplace
info.description: Complete API collection for the Shift job marketplace backend. Includes phone registration, OTP verification, key preferences setup (industries, roles, shift preferences, social media), and profile management for both job seekers and companies in Oman.

item.name: 1. Phone Registration & Verification

request.description: Register a new phone number with user type selection. This is the first step in the user journey.
Check if a phone number exists and get user status.
Verify phone number using OTP. Ready for integration with Oman-based OTP providers.
Retrieve user information by phone number.
Update the user type (seeker/company).
Get phone registration statistics.

item.description: Phone registration and OTP verification endpoints for Oman-based users.

item.name: 2. Key Preferences Setup

request.description: Create comprehensive user preferences including industries, roles, shift preferences, social media, and referral data.
Retrieve user preferences and onboarding data.
Add an industry to user preferences.
Remove an industry from user preferences.
Add a role to user preferences.
Remove a role from user preferences.
Add a social media preference. Valid options: instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, snapchat, whatsapp, telegram.
Remove a social media preference from user preferences.
Mark an onboarding step as completed. Valid steps: industry_selection, role_selection, hiring_needs.

item.description: Key preferences setup including industries, roles, shift preferences, and social media preferences.

item.name: 3. Analytics & Stats

request.description: Get onboarding completion statistics.
Get most popular industries selected during onboarding.
Get most popular roles selected during onboarding.

item.description: Analytics and statistics endpoints for tracking user preferences and onboarding completion.

item.name: 4. Seeker Profile Management - Professional Implementation

body.raw:
{
  "userId": "{{userId}}",
  "fullName": "Ahmed Al-Harthy",
  "idNumber": "1234567890",
  "dateOfBirth": "15 March 1995",
  "gender": "Male",
  "mobileNumber": "+968-92345678",
  "email": "ahmed.harthy@gmail.com",
  "profilePhoto": "https://storage.firebase.com/profiles/ahmed-harthy.jpg",
  "bio": "Experienced hospitality professional with 5+ years in customer service. Passionate about delivering exceptional guest experiences and looking for opportunities to grow in Oman's dynamic service industry.",
  "educationalLevel": "Bachelor",
  "industries": ["Hospitality", "Retail", "Food & Beverage"],
  "roles": ["Waiter", "Cashier", "Barista", "Sales Associate"],
  "yearsOfExperience": "5",
  "skills": ["Customer Service", "Arabic/English", "Point of Sale", "Cash Handling", "Team Leadership"],
  "previousWorkplaces": ["Costa Coffee Oman", "Carrefour Muscat", "McDonald's Oman"],
  "certificates": "Food Safety Certificate (2023), Customer Service Excellence (2022), Barista Training (2021)",
  "availability": "Both",
  "currentStatus": "Working",
  "workType": "Full-Time Work",
  "preferredLocations": ["Muscat", "Seeb", "Barka"],
  "languages": ["Arabic", "English", "Hindi"],
  "retailAcademyTrained": "Yes",
  "acceptedTerms": true,
  "profileConfirmed": true
}

request.description: Create detailed job seeker profile using the new 5-step completion process with comprehensive fields.

item.name: Get Seeker Profile by User ID

request.description: Retrieve seeker profile using user ID.
Retrieve seeker profile using seeker ID.

body.raw:
{
  "fullName": "Ahmed Al-Rashid",
  "email": "ahmed.new@example.com",
  "skills": ["Customer Service", "Arabic/English", "Inventory Management"],
  "preferredLocations": ["Muscat", "Seeb", "Barka", "Salalah"],
  "bio": "Updated bio with more experience and skills. Looking for management opportunities in retail and hospitality sectors."
}

request.description: Update seeker profile information with new comprehensive fields.

body.raw:
{
  "fullName": "Ahmed Al-Harthy",
  "idNumber": "1234567890",
  "dateOfBirth": "15 March 1995",
  "gender": "Male",
  "mobileNumber": "+968-92345678",
  "email": "ahmed.harthy@gmail.com",
  "profilePhoto": "https://storage.firebase.com/profiles/ahmed-harthy.jpg",
  "bio": "Experienced hospitality professional with 5+ years in customer service.",
  "educationalLevel": "Bachelor"
}

request.description: Complete Step 1: Personal Information in 5-step profile completion process.

body.raw:
{
  "industries": ["Hospitality", "Retail", "Food & Beverage"],
  "roles": ["Waiter", "Cashier", "Barista", "Sales Associate"],
  "yearsOfExperience": "5",
  "skills": ["Customer Service", "Arabic/English", "Point of Sale", "Cash Handling"],
  "previousWorkplaces": ["Costa Coffee Oman", "Carrefour Muscat"],
  "certificates": "Food Safety Certificate (2023), Customer Service Excellence (2022)"
}

request.description: Complete Step 2: Professional Information in 5-step profile completion process.
Complete Step 3: Availability & Preferences in 5-step profile completion process.
Complete Step 4: Terms & Conditions in 5-step profile completion process.
Complete Step 5: Profile Confirmation in 5-step profile completion process.
Search for job seekers based on comprehensive criteria including industries, roles, skills, locations, languages, availability, work type, and activity score.
Check profile completion percentage and missing fields.
Upload or update profile photo.
Upload or update CV file.
Request professional video recording by admin team.
Schedule video recording (Admin only).
Mark video as recorded (Admin only).
Publish video (Admin only).
Reject video request (Admin only).
Get video workflow status and timeline.
Add strike for no-show or unprofessional behavior (Admin only).
Update seeker activity score based on actions.
Get high-performing seekers (activity score >= 70).
Get seekers by preferred location.
Get seekers with pending video requests (Admin only).
Get seekers with scheduled video recordings (Admin only).

item.name: Admin: Get Recorded Videos Pending Publication

request.description: Get seekers with recorded videos pending publication (Admin only).
Get video workflow statistics (Admin only).

item.description: Complete seeker profile management with 5-step completion process.

item.name: 5. Company Profile Management - Professional Implementation with 14-Day Trial

request.description: Create detailed company profile using onboarding preferences.

item.name: Get Company Profile by User ID

request.description: Retrieve company profile using user ID.
Retrieve company profile using company ID.

body.raw:
{
  "companyName": "Al-Rashid Trading LLC",
  "website": "https://www.alrashid.om",
  "businessDescription": "Leading retail company in Oman",
  "operatingGovernorate": ["Muscat", "Dhofar"],
  "averageJobsPerMonth": 5
}

request.description: Update company profile information.
Complete specific step in 6-step company profile completion process.
Search for companies based on criteria.
Check company profile completion percentage and missing fields.
Upload or update company logo.
Check if a commercial registration number exists.
Update company trial status and remaining days.
Add payment method for subscriptions and payments.
Purchase starter (99 OMR) or professional (199 OMR) subscription plan.
Process pay-as-you-go payment (5 OMR per match + interview packages).
Request custom enterprise plan from admin team.
Contact admin team for support or assistance.
Invite team member to company account.
Add new brand to company profile.
Add new business location (subject to plan limits).
Get detailed subscription information including trial status, plan limits, and usage stats.
Get company payment transaction history.
Admin endpoint to verify company CR and award credits.
Get complete company profile with all admin details including trial status, payment history, and verification status.

item.description: Complete company profile management with 6-step completion process, 14-day trial system, subscription management, payment integration with Oman banks, and admin verification workflow.

request.description: Check if the server is running and healthy.
